extendedInfo.description: This is BUG VILLAGE, a tiny town where you build and nurture a colony of ACTIVE ANTS and BUSY BEES! Construct homes to attract PLAYFUL BUGS and direct them to the garden, where they can gather resources to expand your village. Feed your bugs to keep them energized and healthy. Add cute decorations and flowers to make the colony BUZZ WITH EXCITEMENT! Small is beautiful in BUG VILLAGE!A BEAUTIFUL, MINIATURE 3D WORLDThe first fully 3D casual city building gameBUILD YOUR OWN VILLAGE AND GARDENPlace new bug houses and decorations in the village and plant flowers in the gardenBUGS CAN BE CUTE TOO!Interact with your Ants and Bees, help Ladybugs and shoo away the Stinky Bugs and Ant LionsKEEP YOUR BUGS HAPPYFeed your bugs cookies, cupcakes and other fun food itemsFOLLOW US atFacebook.com/BugVillageTwitter @glumobile*** BUG VILLAGE is free to play.  Players can purchase additional Coins and Acorns (the in-game currency) for real money, or earn currency through special offers.  ***Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobileâs Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobileâs Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply.

reviews.title: So far, so good.
reviews.comment: I just stated but the game is running smoothly and as for eveyone saying it resets at (normally) around lvl 20, if you just get off you\'re game for a few hours then try again it\'ll work fine and all your stuff will be there. I\'ve had Glu games do that to me before but have patience, put your phone down, it\'s not that hard. Try again in a few hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent game on samsung galaxy tab 2 7.0
reviews.comment: This is an excellent game where you can build your own bug village with ants and various bugs. The game is extremely addictive as you have goals you have to reach in order to sustain your village and keep it thrivng and healthy. Highly recommended :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this game good time killer nice graphics totaly I love it :-)
reviews.author: njr medona almeda

reviews.title: Lost everything @ level 29
reviews.comment: This was a great game... Until it completely reset to level 1 for no reason. Had 500k acorns and had been developing my village for months... guess I was warned by others reviews... not doing that again... Uninstalling.

reviews.title: Hmmm

reviews.comment: No update since valentines and now on level 40 and nothing 2 do. 3rd time playing after game crashed and had 2 begin from level 1, 3rd time lucky I thought. Got boring in the end so deleting

reviews.title: Nice to pass time with
reviews.comment: But some of the quests have you spending all your acorns & coins. I have yet to get a daily bonus when I\'m connected. I wouldn\'t spend any real $ as others have been burned & well its just an \"alright\" game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot connect to the server!!
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I connect to the server...my WiFi is working on all others apps. Also FYI - if your game reset back to level one uninstall and reinstall the game and it will take you back to your original level. The server and facebook remembers whereon were a. Now if the connection issue could be fixed I will be a happy little bug fan!!! BTW I am on level 30!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Overall pretty basic. Cool graphics, nice simple set of goals etc. Fun for the whole family :)) would give 5\342\230\205 if it was a little more interesting.
